page.title: 11Sigglesthorne Village Shop.
page.content: Sigglesthorne's present shop was built about 10 years ago.It is the {only shop}in the village. Now 4 people work there(mostly parttime) They are Michelle Chew,Mr and Mrs Stuffins and Mrs Rowden (my mum). The shop{sells}sweets, wines and spirits, meat, frozen food, newspapers vegetables, cleaning materials, and general hardware etc. Nearly all the{customers}come from Sigglesthorne and Seaton but some come from Leven and Hornsea. I think Sigglesthorne shop gives good{service}because it is close to the old people's bungalows plus it has got everything you need. Before the actual shop was built the house was a Post Office and a shop in the dining room. Mr and Mrs Stuffins who own it now do not know when the house was built.
